mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO AUTOTRADE ( AUTOID, AUTONAME, CUSTNO, STATE, APKIND,
TYPE, CYCLE, DAT, FROM_BANKSERIALID, FROM_ACCOID,
FROM_TRADEACCO, FROM_FUNDCODE, FROM_FUNDCORPNO, FROM_CHARGETYPE, TO_BANKSERIALID,
TO_ACCOID, TO_TRADEACCO, TO_FUNDCODE, TO_FUNDCORPNO, TO_CHARGETYPE,
AUTOAMT, AUTOVOL, LASTDATE, NEXTDATE, SUMMARY,
CREATETIME, UPDATETIME ) VALUES ( #{autoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frombankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromaccoid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fromtradeacco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromfundcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromfundcorpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromchargetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tobankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{toaccoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totradeacco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tofundcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tofundcorpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tochargetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{autoamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{autovol,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.select:
SELECT autotrade.AUTOID, autotrade.AUTONAME, autotrade.CUSTNO, autotrade.STATE, autotrade.APKIND, autotrade.TYPE, autotrade.CYCLE, autotrade.DAT, autotrade.FROM_BANKSERIALID AS FROMBANKSERIALID, autotrade.FROM_ACCOID AS FROMACCOID, autotrade.FROM_TRADEACCO AS FROMTRADEACCO, autotrade.FROM_FUNDCODE AS FROMFUNDCODE, autotrade.FROM_FUNDCORPNO AS FROMFUNDCORPNO, autotrade.FROM_CHARGETYPE AS FROMCHARGETYPE, autotrade.TO_BANKSERIALID, autotrade.TO_ACCOID, autotrade.TO_TRADEACCO, autotrade.TO_FUNDCODE, autotrade.TO_FUNDCORPNO, autotrade.TO_CHARGETYPE, autotrade.AUTOAMT, autotrade.AUTOVOL, autotrade.LASTDATE, autotrade.NEXTDATE, autotrade.SUMMARY, autotrade.CREATETIME, autotrade.UPDATETIME FROM autotrade WHERE
autotrade.AUTOID = #{autoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
autotrade.CUSTNO = #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
autotrade.STATE <> 'C'
